title: RBI's proposed digital payments intelligence platform will mitigate frauds, say experts
description: The Reserve Bank's proposal to establish a digital payments intelligence platform aims to combat fraud and enhance consumer trust. A committee led by A P Hota will assess the creation of this platform, leveraging advanced technologies to mitigate payment fraud risks.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
